mapper.insert: insert into book (user_id, title, body) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{body})
mapper.select: select book.id, book.user_id, book.title, book.body, m_user.id as user_id, m_user.name as user_name, m_user.email as user_email, m_user.password as user_password, m_user.introduction as user_introduction from book inner join m_user on book.user_id = m_user.id where book.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update book set title = #{title}, body = #{body} where id = #{id}
